pages.text: thumma yatubu l-lahu min baʿdi dhalika ʿala man yashau wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun

yaayyuha alladhina amanu innama l-mush'rikuna najasun fala yaqrabu l-masjida l-harama baʿda ʿamihim hadha wa-in khif'tum ʿaylatan fasawfa yugh'nikumu l-lahu min fadlihi in shaa inna l-laha ʿalimun hakimun

qatilu alladhina la yu'minuna bil-lahi wala bil-yawmi l-akhiri wala yuharrimuna ma harrama l-lahu warasuluhu wala yadinuna dina l-haqi mina alladhina utu l-kitaba hatta yuʿ'tu l-jiz'yata ʿan yadin wahum saghiruna
waqalati l-yahudu ʿuzayrun ub'nu l-lahi waqalati l-nasara l-masihu ub'nu l-lahi dhalika qawluhum bi-afwahihim yudahiuna qawla alladhina kafaru min qablu qatalahumu l-lahu anna yu'fakuna
ittakhadhu ahbarahum waruh'banahum arbaban min duni l-lahi wal-masiha ib'na maryama wama umiru illa liyaʿbudu ilahan wahidan la ilaha illa huwa sub'hanahu ʿamma yush'rikuna
